name: Bubble Jewels 2 Classic
description:
DOWNLOAD NOW AND START HAVING FUN! 100% FREE!
Check out the reviews - you're going to love Bubble Jewels 2!
••••• "I find this game interesting and challenging, since it is fun for me to figure out angles to "bank" my shooter bubble off the sides to get into tight places to pop more bubbles! I've about mastered that! Very enjoyable game!" --AntsAway
••••• "My go-to game. This is my choice for those times I just need a few minutes of down time. Enough of a challenge to keep me coming back, but tons of fun. Thanks!" --phillipsdo


EASY TO LEARN AND PLAY!

• Just touch the screen to launch a bubble exactly where you want it to go!

• Match 3 or more bubbles of the same color and they drop!

• Your goal is to clear all the bubbles from the board… You can do it!


NEW SPECIAL BUBBLES!

• The Rainbow Bubble matches every color!

• Rock Bubbles get in your way, so you'll have to knock down all the bubbles around them…

• Use the new Bomb Bubble to knock down every bubble that it touches!

• When the rare Magic Bubble lands, it magically removes every bubble on the board that have the same color as the bubbles it touches!


FIVE GAME MODES TO SUIT YOUR MOOD!

• Want classic Bubble Jewels color-matching fun, that's even better? Try Classic Mode!

• Do you love making it to high levels, but get frustrated when you have to start over? Try Endless Mode!

• Want a super-hard challenge that's not for the faint of heart? Try Challenge Mode and match 4 bubbles instead of 3! And then 5… And then 6...

• Feeling antsy - try Dizzy mode where the bubble launcher dances around the screen! Time your shots carefully...

• Or try Blitz Mode! You've got 60 seconds - how high can you score? Bet you can't just play it once!


RELAX WHILE YOU SHARPEN YOUR MIND!

• No timers (except in Blitz Mode), so take your time and relax

• Beautiful graphics and animation

• Relaxing sound effects

• Listen to your iPod music while playing


GOOD TIMES

• Simple and elegant gameplay

• Endless variety, never the same game twice

• Compare your scores with the world using Game Center (iOS4/5 devices)

• Magic auto-save - go ahead and quit the game, take a phone call, send a text - when you come back, your game will be waiting for you!


Get Bubble Jewels 2 now, and start the fun!
